column5: Its been a while but thought I would share my latest post as everyone is starting to think/dream about fishing in Canada shortly Sometimes when I can't sleep at night I count fish instead of sheep lol Specifically I revisit some of my favorite memories from trips I have taken* For whatever reason it really works and I rarely get past 4 memories before I drift off Here's a few of my favoriteshttps://www.northernjacks.com/post/counting-fish Cheers Andrew
Good thing you don't live in Minnesota,you'd never get to sleep nothing to count.

Lol. True There is a flip side. Fishing at the cottage where walleye are rare this weekend. Brother in law hooks into a nice one, no net and yours truly messed up the landing. That one will keep me up for a bit Andrew
The big ones almost always get away,lucky for me some of my ex GF's got away they were way over the slot.

Andrew, I might have to employ this tactic Saturday night as I am sure I will be amped up anticipating our drive all day Sunday and attempting to cross the border early Monday morning for a quick jaunt to the "go to" place. Just happened to have moved our trip to next week after the 2nd year of denial. Just Dock and I as we are the most flexible but anticipating low water levels, smoky skies and hungry walleyes. Will share a report on our return. Also anticipating a September trip to Savant Lake with Wildewood. Go away Delta Variant! Fish On! Hooks
Hooks I hope it works for you! Enjoy your trip, low water, high water I am sure it will be epic Cheers Andrew
